name: The myth of 2weeks
description:
Hi, "The myth of 2weeks" was made as a learning project for the game engine Unity. It started really small with only one level but i liked the experience of developing a game and I expanded the project further.

My goal was to make a playable fun game with all the features that I could put into it, with only 2 weeks time in my disposal. Eventually, I end up working on the game for 3 and a half weeks(that was the inspiration for the title). So, when I started I thought that making a game would be easy because "it's just a platformer game". What I learned in the process was that it's more difficult than I thought, but at the same time developing a game was much more fun than I expected. I hope you like the end result.... enjoy

MOVE: w, a, s, d

JUMP: space

SOUND: there is a chance that you can't hear the music or the SFX, just turn volume all the way up and you 'll be fine.

ENEMIES: Unfortunately, you can't use the hero's hammer, but you can kill the enemies by jumping on them.

 

  • Fun fact_1: Two of my friends and I tried to make another biiiigggg game and we named the team that we created "2weeks", because my friends where having fun with me telling "oh you can make a game in 2 weeks, it's not that hard"...
  • Fun fact_2: The cover image and the victory scene at the end of the game is a tribute to the "2weeks" team we created with my friends. We even had a logo hehe....
